website_summaries.verdict: While we still prefer using the speedier and more accurate mouse, some will no doubt be interested in the Magic Trackpad. It's not magic — it does no more or less than you'd expect it to. But then, that's not necessarily a bad thing.
pros: Proper gestures on the desktop, unlike the Magic Mouse
cons: Not as precise or fast as a mouse
Some may not approve of the ergonomics
You'll need to buy Snow Leopard to use it on Windows

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: It is used or refurbished but looks brand new and works perfectly. No issues with mine. Came up as administrator trackpad. For the price and quality I'm happy. I don't like Amazon has been bundling reviews for similar items over individual reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works most of the time with Fedora 29
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is not nearly as good as a Logitech Mouse, I've had this a few months and I've changed the batteries twice already. The price isn't bad for a nice touchpad an until the magic trackpad 2 is supported (it's coming), there's not a lot of options. I get random drops in connectivity, every other day or so, using a Dell XPS 15 but I won't blame the trackpad for that.
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: A big touch pad for your Mac.
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Really enjoying it over the traditional mouse. Our mac is very old, nine years or so. This helps give it a bit of new life.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph S.

customer_reviews.title: Reconditioned trackpad is like-new and an excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a reconditioned item and I can't distinguish it from a new one. There isn't a mark or scratch on it, absolutely no sign of wear. The trackpad hooked up without effort and has been in daily use since I bought it. Simply stated, it makes sense to save a few dollars and buy this item as reconditioned rather than new.
customer_reviews.author: Bocaboy

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my desk setup
customer_reviews.text: This trackpad allows me to use a wireless keyboard and store my Mac Air in a vertical stand, allowing me to more space and to move around the desk space easily. It doesn't seem quite a responsive as the trackpad on the Mac, but it is a great enhancement to my set up.
customer_reviews.author: Practical Gourmet

customer_reviews.title: Just what wife needed.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's favorite fruit computer and she is very happy with it. What ever, I like my Ubuntu tower PC much better but maybe that's just me. I've got 25+ years earning my living with computers.
customer_reviews.author: Will, the tink

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. No complaints.
customer_reviews.text: The trackpad came with high quality energizer batteries installed. Arrived sealed in original Apple box. Paired with my MacBook Air with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Seemed to work fine until the return window closed on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I hope someone from customer support can help me with this seller so I can update my review. I've had several of these devices and they are great, however the one I just purchased on 06AUG18, now 12SEP18 the trackpad won't stay on for longer than it takes to pair the device. Anyone out there have any ideas?
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for normally overpriced Apple product!
customer_reviews.text: Solid Apple quality. Decent but not amazing battery life. Works like brand new!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: iMac is better with gesture inputs
customer_reviews.text: This track pad is so much better than a mouse! The ability to use finger jesters is amazing. I only wish Apple kept making this first generation design so the early iMac’s could have access to this wonderful tool.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and easy
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to go with my Apple iMac. Smooth and easy
customer_reviews.author: T. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Worked well in the beginning, but...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great when I first got it but it's now 4 months later and it's getting stuck and not working well. Don't recommend it if you want something that will last you a while.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Call the exterminator! Get rid of the mouse
customer_reviews.text: So much better than a muse. You won't go back!
customer_reviews.author: Terry Haines

customer_reviews.title: Works Exactly Like It should
customer_reviews.text: Nice to have something simple that works exactly as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Power of the Track Pad for your Mac Pro
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the Magic Trackpad. It is like using my MacBook when I am using my Mac Pro. A nice addition for any Mac lover.
customer_reviews.author: Etzel C. Brower Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t even turn on
customer_reviews.text: The Trackpad wouldn’t even turn on. Returning it and not buying another product from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Sean & Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Apple Trackpad makes computing fun!
customer_reviews.text: The trackpad makes computing on Mac OS X El Captain more fun. Now I can use all the gestures with my Mac mini. Easy to interface with bluetooth. Really like this accessory.
customer_reviews.author: djanko93

customer_reviews.title: Not really refurbished.
customer_reviews.text: If you think refurbished means "as new", this is not the case. You can definitely see many scratches at the back of it. You can probably get a way better deal on craigslist.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great until it gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: The click gets stuck all the time.. Very annoying. I have to. Pick up the whole track pad to have it click when it gets stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Grajales

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It goes really well with my iMac you could really see the sheerness, thickness and the ergonomic right beside the iMac and my mouse.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! Connected to my MacBook Pro with no issues. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: GlintsCollide

customer_reviews.title: Clunky compared to actual macbook trackpad, feels bad
customer_reviews.text: click speed is incredibly slow, does not respond in the satisfying manner a real trackpad does. would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: rcy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Everything is exactly as expected, trackpad 2 only works with OS El Capitan and higher needed one that worked with Yosemite
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purchase new if possible
customer_reviews.text: Was hesitant about ordering refurbished to begin with. Can definitely tell it’s not new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Complaints.
customer_reviews.text: Got as a gift for my dad. He loves it. Synced up with his old mac mini quick. No Complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Michael j Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Apple Magic Trackpad is a must have
customer_reviews.text: Apple Magic Trackpad is a must have for any owner of the Apple computer line. No need to switch between "lefty" and "righty." Works the same no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: Ira Hess

customer_reviews.title: Get the newer one
customer_reviews.text: I thought I’d save some money and desk space by getting the older model. Unfortunately compared to a 2015 MacBook Pro touchpad this requires a lot of force to click, so does not work well alongside the last two generations of those laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Nils T. Devine

customer_reviews.title: Broken 4 months later.  Poor design and no warranty.  Avoid these.
customer_reviews.text: The little rubber feet are a nightmare. Product is broken 4 months after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Received damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I chose to go with this certified refurbished one but this is completely unacceptable. Never did I think I would be receiving a trackpad that was actually estheticly damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: My track pad stopped working after 2 months. I tried changing the batteries multiple times, turning on and off, etc with no luck. Don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cara pryor

customer_reviews.title: All's Good!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived on time (during the Christmas rush) and works fine. We are completely happy with the transaction and the product.
customer_reviews.author: Dorinda Giles

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product arrived quickly and is in perfect working order
customer_reviews.author: BluntFlowers

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival. Trackpad has marks and deep scratches all over it. Will not pair with any computer; tried it with three different Macs that successfully pair with other trackpads. Waste of time, as I now have to order one from somewhere else and wait for it to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: In the Mountains

customer_reviews.title: Positive feedback
customer_reviews.text: Item is working fine Shipping system os awesome Love the tracking message as it was being shipped.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Apple Magic Trackpad
customer_reviews.text: This Pad is Relly nice. It's easy to use and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Everett G. Lackey Jr.

product_meta.title: Apple Magic Trackpad Compatible with Apple Mac Desktop Computer MC380LL/A (Renewed)
product_meta.description: The first Multi-Touch Trackpad designed to work with your Mac desktop computer, the Apple Magic Trackpad lets your fingers do the clicking, scrolling, and swiping. The Apple Magic uses the same Multi-Touch technology found on the MacBook Pro, giving you a whole new way to control and interact with what's on your screen. Swiping through pages online feels just like flipping through pages in a book or magazine. Inertial scrolling makes moving up and down a page more natural than ever. And users can press down anywhere on the Multi-Touch surface to physically click or double-click on an item--no clumsy buttons involved.
feature_bullets: Magic Trackpad gives you a whole new way to control what's on your Mac desktop computer.
Swiping through pages on screen is just like flipping through pages in a magazine. Inertial scrolling senses the momentum in your fingers as you move up and down a page.
Nearly 80 percent larger than the built-in trackpad on the MacBook Pro, giving you plenty of room to perform gestures.
Magic Trackpad connects to your Mac via Bluetooth wireless technology.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars80 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
